text: Konstantin Anatolyevich Chuychenko (; born 12 July 1965) is a Russian politician, businessman, and lawyer. He is the Minister of Justice since 21 January 2020. He was Deputy Prime Minister of Russia and Chief of Staff of the Government from 2018 to 2020. ==References== Category:Russian businesspeople Category:Russian lawyers Category:Russian politicians Category:Living people Category:1965 births Category:People from Lipetsk Oblast
title: Konstantin Chuychenko
